comments:
Eclipse 20041013
Mac os x 10.3.5

If you double click a node in the tree shown in a ContainerSelectionDialog so
that you collapse the tree before its finished expanding you get this exception:

Patch

We haven't been able to replicate this here so I would appreciate it very much
if you could try out this patch. I think we need a slower machine than we
currently have in the office.
